title: Skarner, worth it?
body:
Is skarner worth buying after buff? 
Thoughts?

Please comment you reasons :D 

Thanks

replies.body: He is broken and will be nerfed soon. I would wait. He pretty much a perma ban now anyway

In the meantime he is being abused for freelo lol

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/jungle/by-winrate
He also has something like a 75% ban rate in the past week. People starting to catch on
I got absolutely crushed by a skarner last week.  Was highly embarrassing.
they'll only get a guaranteed nerf if hes played in lcs and/or has consistently top 10 winrate imo. but yeah we'd have to wait and see before looking to buy him as a strong pick

> [{quoted}](name=GigaPube,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=oAu61ZiA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-23T04:01:20.934+0000)
>
> they'll only get a guaranteed nerf if hes played in lcs and/or has consistently top 10 winrate imo. but yeah we'd have to wait and see before looking to buy him as a strong pick

"Skarner: Way too strong. We'll likely hotfix nerf as a result (start of next week is what we're looking at, which would be the earliest available opportunity)"

He is super strong right now, they changed his kit to mostly scale with AD so you don't even need to buy ap or really even defense and he can gank before 6 now due to the guaranteed stun if you land your e and auto attack once = strong ganks, after 6 super strong ganks, then later on mid to late massive dmg and no one can touch you (and if they try you can pretty much always destroy them) if you keep good control or your shrines .. not to mention they give you really good control of the enemy jungle, they have changed him around quite a lot over the past year/s or so and still know one really played him until now so either they will nerf him,  and I still reckon he will be strong unless they take away his shrines or do some silly reduce dmg by 50% thing .. I think he was strong before nerf so I would buy him any day :)

Played him yesterday.
I didn't even get a defensive item until, like, 20min. Get an upgraded Yellow trinket and ward your crystals... Guaranteed kills.
Skarner has over a 61% win rate right now. He is ridiculously broken. So uh yeah, buy him before the nerf!
